sentences.sentence: Malian National Assembly President to visit China.
sentences.translation: 马里国民议会议长即将访问中国。

sentences.sentence: It was organized by the Malian Ministry of Health with technical support from WHO and other organizations.
sentences.translation: 该运动是由马里卫生部组织的，并得到了世卫组织和其它组织的技术支持。

sentences.sentence: China welcomes Mali to participate in the 2010 World Expo in Shanghai to showcase the Malian civilization and arts.
sentences.translation: 中方欢迎马方参加2010年上海世博会，展示马里文明和艺术。
